labels.label: Serialize CSV into Avro by fetching Schema associated with kafka topic from the HWX Schema REgistry.

Upstream app is sending avro objects serialized via HWX Schema REgistry into kafka topics
Use ConsumeKafkaRecord to read Avro and convert to CSV by doing the following: 1. Get schemaId from beginning bytes of serialized AVro object 2. Use the schemaId to lookup the schema 3. Convert Avro object to CSV Records using the schema 4. Route events by event source (speed or geo) using SQL

processors.name: Publish Events to Truck Stream Topics
